title: Gender Bias Analysis Report

understanding.description: The Gender Bias Score measures the imbalance between masculine and feminine terms in the text. A score of 0 indicates perfect balance, while higher scores indicate more gender-specific language.

candidate_analysis.recommendation: This resume uses gender-neutral language effectively.
This resume shows significant gender imbalance in language usage.

recommendations: Use gender-neutral job titles (e.g., 'chairperson' instead of 'chairman/chairwoman').
Replace gendered pronouns with 'they/them' where possible.
Focus on skills and achievements rather than personal attributes.
Review for unconscious bias in language describing leadership, technical skills, etc.
